specimen_collector_sample_id.name: Sample ID
specimen_collector_sample_id.description: The specimen_collector_sample_identifier is a unique name or label assigned by the sample collector to each sample.

case_id.name: Case ID
case_id.description: The identifier used to specify an epidemiologically detected case of disease.

biosample_accession.name: Biosample Accession
biosample_accession.description: The identifier assigned to a BioSample. It ideally exists in a curated collection (e.g. stock centres, seed banks, DNA banks). The ID should have the following structure: name of the institution (institution code) followed by the collection code (if available) and the voucher id (institution_code:collection_code:vouche… Please note institution codes and collection codes are taken from a controlled vocabulary maintained by the INSDC: https://ftp.ncbi.nih.gov./pub/taxonomy/bi...

sequence_read_accession.name: Read Accession
sequence_read_accession.description: The sequence read accession is a repository identifier that links raw read data, methodological metadata, and quality control metrics. Repositories include those in the INSDC—the NCBI Sequence Read Archive (SRA), European Nucleotide Archive (ENA), and the DDBJ Sequence Read Archive (DRA), as well as repository(ies) from the CNCB/NGDC (China National Center for Bioinformation, National Genomics Data Center).

assembly_accession.name: Assembly Accession
assembly_accession.description: The versioned identifier assigned to an assembly or consensus sequence in  one of the International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration (INSDC) repositories, or China National Center for Bioinformation (CNCB), National Genomics Data Center (NGDC) repository.

sample_collected_by.name: Collected By
sample_collected_by.description: The name of the agency that collected the original sample.

other_sample_collected_by.name: Other Collected By
other_sample_collected_by.description: The name of the agency that collected the original sample.

sample_collection_date.name: Collection Date
sample_collection_date.description: the date on which the sample was collected.

study_id.name: Study ID
study_id.description: A sequence of characters used to identify, name, or characterize the study.

study_site_id.name: Site ID
study_site_id.description: A sequence-of characters used to identify, name, or characterize the study site.

population.name: Population
population.description: A population is a collection of individuals from the same taxonomic class living, counted or sampled at a particular site or in a particular area.
enum: F0 Adults Emerged From Field Collected Eggs
F0 Adults Emerged From Field Collected Larvae
F0 Adults Emerged From Field Collected Pupae
F1 Adults From Field Collected Mosquitoes
F1 Larvae Bred From Field Collected Mosquitoes

purpose_of_sampling.name: Sampling Purpose
purpose_of_sampling.description: describes the reason that the sample was collected
enum: Surveillance Of International Border Crossing By Air Travel Or Ground Transport
Surveillance Of International Border Crossing By Air Travel
Surveillance Of International Border Crossing By Ground Transport

geo_loc_name_country.name: Country
geo_loc_name_country.description: country of origin of the sample

geo_loc_name_state_province_territory.name: Province
geo_loc_name_state_province_territory.description: describes the state, province, or territory of origin of the sample

altitude.name: Altitude
altitude.description: The altitude of the sample is the vertical distance between Earth's surface above Sea Level and the sampled position in the air.

depth.name: Depth
depth.description: The vertical distance below local surface, e.g., for sediment or soil samples depth is measured from sediment or soil surface, respectively. Depth can be reported as an interval for subsurface samples.

breeding_habitat.name: Breeding Habitat
breeding_habitat.description: An environmental system which can sustain and allow the growth of an Anopheles mosquito population.

mosquito_density.name: Mosquito Density
mosquito_density.description: The number of mosquitoes present in a defined area or environment at a given time.

anatomical_material.name: Anatomical Material
anatomical_material.description: A substance obtained from an anatomical part of an organism e.g. tissue, blood.

other_anatomical_material.name: Other Anatomical Material
other_anatomical_material.description: A substance obtained from an anatomical part of an organism e.g. tissue, blood.

anatomical_part.name: Anatomical Part
anatomical_part.description: An anatomical part of an organism e.g. oropharynx.

other_anatomical_part.name: Other Anatomical Part
other_anatomical_part.description: An anatomical part of an organism e.g. oropharynx.

body_product.name: Body Product
body_product.description: A substance excreted/secreted from an organism e.g. feces, urine, sweat.

other_body_product.name: Other Body Product
other_body_product.description: A substance excreted/secreted from an organism e.g. feces, urine, sweat.

environmental_material.name: Environmental Material
environmental_material.description: A data field which describes the substance obtained from the natural or man-made environment.

other_environmental_material.name: Other Environmental Material
other_environmental_material.description: A data field which describes the substance obtained from the natural or man-made environment.

detection_of_parasite_procedure.name: Parasite Detection
detection_of_parasite_procedure.description: A procedure used for the diagnosis of malaria, including the precise pathogen causing the disease.

other_detection_of_parasite_procedure.name: Other Parasite Detection
other_detection_of_parasite_procedure.description: A data field which describes the substance obtained from the natural or man-made environment.

biospecimen_processing_date.name: Biospecimen Processing Date
biospecimen_processing_date.description: The date on which the sample was processed

insecticide_class.name: Insecticide Class
insecticide_class.description: Insecticide class - chemical groups categorized by their mode of action to control mosquito vectors and manage resistance in malaria prevention programs.

insecticide.name: Insecticide
insecticide.description: Strictly, a substance intended to kill members of the class Insecta. In common usage, any substance used for preventing, destroying, repelling or controlling insects.

isolate_id.name: Isolate ID
isolate_id.description: The user-defined identifier for the isolate, as provided by the laboratory that originally isolated the isolate.

second_host_subject_id.name: Subject ID
second_host_subject_id.description: A unique identifier by which each host can be referred to e.g. #131

second_host_scientific_name.name: Scientific Name
second_host_scientific_name.description: The taxonomic, or scientific name of the host.

other_host_scientific_name.name: Other Scientific Name
other_host_scientific_name.description: The taxonomic, or scientific name of the host.

second_host_complex.name: Complex
second_host_complex.description: Group of closely related species that are morphologically similar in all main life stages (egg, larva, pupa, and adult) but moleculary different. E.g., Anopheles gambiae complex.

second_host_sex.name: Sex
second_host_sex.description: A subject sex is the phenotypic sex of given subject (human or animal) related to a given investigation, study, and/or specimen.

second_host_genotype.name: Genotype
second_host_genotype.description: A genetic characteristics information that is about the genetic material of an organism and minimally includes information about the genetic background and can in addition contain information about specific alleles, genetic modifications, etc.

second_host_phenotype.name: Phenotype
second_host_phenotype.description: The assemblage of traits or outward appearance of an individual. It is the product of interactions between genes and the environment.

insecticide_resistance_type.name: Resistance Type
insecticide_resistance_type.description: Refers to the types of insecticide resistance(s).

insecticide_resistance_mechanism.name: Resistance
insecticide_resistance_mechanism.description: Report the mechanism that led to an insecticide resistance.

specimen_processing.name: Specimen
specimen_processing.description: A data field which describes the processing applied to samples post-collection, prior to further testing, characterization, or isolation procedures.

specimen_identification_method.name: Identification Method
specimen_identification_method.description: Modification(s) in the insect cuticle preventing or slowing the absorption or penetration of insecticide.

anopheles_development_stage.name: Development Stage
anopheles_development_stage.description: The developmental stages of mosquitoes belonging to the genus Anopheles.

infectious_agent.name: Infectious Agent
infectious_agent.description: Any organism, such as a virus, parasite, or bacterium, that is capable of invading body tissues and multiplying.

second_host_health_state.name: Health State
second_host_health_state.description: Describes the health status of the second host at the time of sample collection.
enum: Presence Of Pathogen(s) Like Bacteria And Fungi
Abdominal Stage: Nutritional Status: Sugar Content (Or Energy Reserve): Low
Abdominal Stage: Nutritional Status: Sugar Content (Or Energy Reserve): Moderate
Abdominal Stage: Nutritional Status: Sugar Content (Or Energy Reserve): High
Abdominal Stage: Nutritional Status: Blood Meal Fed
Abdominal Stage: Nutritional Status: Blood Meal Unfed
Abdominal Stage: Nutritional Status: Lipid Stored (Or Long-Term Energy): Low
Abdominal Stage: Nutritional Status: Lipid Stored (Or Long-Term Energy): Medium
Abdominal Stage: Nutritional Status: Lipid Stored (Or Long-Term Energy): High
Abdominal Stage: Nutritional Status: Glycogen Stored (Short- To Medium-Term Energy): Low
Abdominal Stage: Nutritional Status: Glycogen Stored (Short- To Medium-Term Energy): Medium
Abdominal Stage: Nutritional Status: Glycogen Stored (Short- To Medium-Term Energy): High
Physical Damage Or Abnormalities Of Wings, Legs, Or Antennae
Physical Damage Or Abnormalities: Presence Of Fungal Infections, Mites Or Parasitoids

attribute_vector.name: Vector Attribute
attribute_vector.description: A quality which refers to vectors.

second_vector_invasive_status.name: Invasive Status
second_vector_invasive_status.description: This variable indicates whether the mosquitoes collected are considered invasive or native.

fasta_header_name.name: FASTA Header
fasta_header_name.description: A unique sequence identifier found in the header line of a FASTA-formatted sequence file. It typically begins with the “>” character and may include accession numbers, sample IDs, or organism identifiers that link the sequence record to its corresponding metadata

fasta_file_name.name: FASTA File
fasta_file_name.description: The name of the file containing nucleotide or protein sequence(s) formatted in the FASTA standard. The filename serves as a reference to the physical data file associated with the sample or sequencing submission.

sequenced_by.name: Sequenced By
sequenced_by.description: The name of the agency that generated the sequence.

purpose_of_sequencing.name: Sequencing Purpose
purpose_of_sequencing.description: The reason that the sample was sequenced.

other_purpose_of_sequencing.name: Other Sequencing Purpose
other_purpose_of_sequencing.description: The reason that the sample was sequenced.

sequencing_date.name: Sequencing Date
sequencing_date.description: The date the sample was sequenced.

sequencing_assay_type.name: Sequencing Assay Type
sequencing_assay_type.description: The overarching sequencing methodology that was used to determine the sequence of a biomaterial.

other_sequencing_assay_type.name: Other Sequencing Assay Type
other_sequencing_assay_type.description: The reason that the sample was sequenced.

sequencing_instrument.name: Sequencing Instrument
sequencing_instrument.description: The model of the sequencing instrument used.

other_sequencing_instrument.name: Other Sequencing Instrument
other_sequencing_instrument.description: The model of the sequencing instrument used.

breadth_of_coverage_value.name: Coverage Breadth
breadth_of_coverage_value.description: The percentage of the reference genome covered by the sequenced data, to a prescribed depth.

depth_of_coverage_value.name: Coverage Depth
depth_of_coverage_value.description: The average number of sequencing reads representing a given nucleotide in the reconstructed sequence.

reference_genome_accession.name: Reference Accession
reference_genome_accession.description: A persistent, unique identifier of a genome database entry.

bioinformatics_protocol.name: Bioinformatics Protocol
bioinformatics_protocol.description: The name and version number of the bioinformatics protocol used.

virulence_factor_gene.name: Virulence Factor
virulence_factor_gene.description: A persistent, unique identifier of a genome database entry.

resistance_gene_name.name: Resistance Name
resistance_gene_name.description: A persistent, unique identifier of a genome database entry.

other_resistance_gene_name.name: Other Resistance Name
other_resistance_gene_name.description: A persistent, unique identifier of a genome database entry.

resistance_gene_symbol.name: Gene Symbol
resistance_gene_symbol.description: A persistent, unique identifier of a genome database entry.

resistance_variant.name: Resistance Variant
resistance_variant.description: The overarching sequencing methodology that was used to determine the sequence of a biomaterial.

other_resistance_variant.name: Other Resistance Variant
other_resistance_variant.description: The reason that the sample was sequenced.

lineage_clade_name.name: Lineage Name
lineage_clade_name.description: A data field which describes the name of the lineage or clade. Example Guidance: Provide the Pangolin or Nextstrain lineage/clade name.
